Lintasarta Raih Dua Penghargaan Best IT & Data Tech Governance
07 Nov 2019, 18:24 by Heri Firmansyah



Lintasarta Raih Dua Penghargaan Best IT & Data Tech Governance



Lintasarta Raih Dua Penghargaan Best IT & Data Tech Governance


KBRN, Jakarta : Dalam ajang Data Technology Governance, AI and Analytics Summit & Awards 2019 yang diselenggarakan pada 6 November 2019 di Jakarta Convention Center (JCC), Lintasarta kembali meraih prestasi dengan mendapatkan dua penghargaan “Best IT & Data Tech Governance” untuk layanan Cloud dan Data Center.
Penghargaan tersebut diterima langsung oleh Corporate Secretary General Manager Lintasarta, Ade Kurniawan, dan Marketing General Manager Lintasarta, Bayu Adi Pramono. 
“Data Center Lintasarta dibangun berdasarkan standar dan sertifikasi internasional, begitu juga untuk sistem keamanan Cloud Services yang terus diperkuat. Hal ini sebagai bentuk keseriusan Lintasarta dalam mengembangkan bisnis dan layanan sebagai ICT solution company,” ungkap Bayu, sesuai menerima penghargaan.Menurutnya, dengan keberhasilan meraih dua penghargaan ini, menjadi bukti keandalan Lintasarta sebagai total ICT Solution, khususnya layanan Data Center dan Cloud services yang memliki standar kualitas layanan yang prima.
“Penghargaan dalam kategori Best IT, Data Tech & AI Governance ini diraih didasarkan atas keberhasilan Lintasarta sebagai penyedia beragam produk solusi yang menerapkan teknologi perlindungan data pengguna untuk layanan Data Center dan Cloud,” ungkapnya.Layanan Data Center Lintasarta memberikan kenyamanan dan keamanan dengan fitur Data Recovery Center (DRC) bagi perusahaan menjalankan kegiatan bisnisnya serta memudahkan dalam menentukan strategi deployment yang paling optimal.
Solusi end to end juga diberikan mulai dari colocation, design & build data center, dan managed operation data center yang didukung oleh tenaga ahli tersertifikasi.Lintasarta sebagai provider local Cloud di Indonesia turut mendukung industri nasional bertransformasi digital dengan layanan Lintasarta Cloud Total Solution mulai dari Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), dan Software as a Service (SaaS).
Layanan Lintasarta Cloud tersertifikasi Cisco Advanced Cloud & Managed Services Certified Partner juga memiliki tingkat keamanan yang tinggi dengan memiliki fitur seperti load balancer, next generation firewall, web application firewall, dan fitur keamanan lainnya.Ade Kurniawan menambahkan, Lintasarta telah memiliki pengalaman melayani pelanggan korporat selama lebih dari 31 tahun yang didukung oleh infrastruktur dan tenaga IT professional handal kepada para pelaku bisnis nasional.
“Dengan adanya ajang penghargaan ini, memacu Lintasarta untuk terus melakukan inovasi dan melayani pelanggan dari berbagai sektor industri,” ujarnya.Acara penghargaan yang diselenggarakan oleh Asosiasi Big Data Indonesia (ABDI) ini merupakan yang kedua kali diadakan, bekerjasama dengan sejumlah asosiasi dan lembaga survey, acara ini juga mendapat dukungan dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika. Turut hadir pula Menteri Riset, Teknologi dan Pendidikan Tinggi Republik Indonesia Bambang Brodjonegoro.

Lintasarta Wins Two Best IT & Data Tech Governance Awards
Nov 7 2019, 18:24 by Heri Firmansyah



Lintasarta Wins Two Best IT & Data Tech Governance Awards



Lintasarta Wins Two Best IT & Data Tech Governance Awards


KBRN, Jakarta: In the Data Technology Governance, AI and Analytics Summit & Awards 2019 event held on November 6, 2019 at the Jakarta Convention Center (JCC), Lintasarta won another achievement by getting two awards "Best IT & Data Tech Governance" for Cloud services and Data Center.
The award was received directly by Lintasarta's Corporate Secretary General Manager, Ade Kurniawan, and Lintasarta's Marketing General Manager, Bayu Adi Pramono.
"Lintasarta's Data Center is built based on international standards and certifications, as well as for the Cloud Services security system which is continuously strengthened. This is a form of Lintasarta's seriousness in developing its business and services as an ICT solution company, "Bayu said, according to receiving the award. According to him, with the success of winning these two awards, it became evidence of the reliability of Lintasarta as a total ICT Solution, specifically Data Center and Cloud services services. possess a high standard of service quality.
"The award in the Best IT, Data Tech & AI Governance category was achieved based on Lintasarta's success as a provider of a variety of product solutions that implement user data protection technology for Data Center and Cloud services," he said. Lintasarta's Data Center Service provides comfort and security with Data features Recovery Center (DRC) for companies running their business activities and making it easier to determine the most optimal deployment strategy.
End-to-end solutions are also provided ranging from colocation, design & build data centers, and managed data center operations supported by certified experts. Lintasarta as a local Cloud provider in Indonesia also supports national industry with digital transformation with Lintasarta Cloud Total Solution services starting from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS).
Certified Lintasarta Cloud Services Cisco Advanced Cloud & Managed Services Certified Partner also has a high level of security by having features such as load balancers, next generation firewalls, web application firewalls, and other security features. Ade Kurniawan added, Lintasarta has had experience serving corporate customers for more than 31 years supported by infrastructure and reliable IT professionals to national business people.
"With this award event, spurring Lintasarta to continue to innovate and serve customers from various industrial sectors," he said. The award ceremony organized by the Indonesian Big Data Association (ABDI) was the second time held, in collaboration with a number of associations and survey institutes , this event also received support from the Ministry of Communication and Information. Also present was the Minister of Research, Technology and Higher Education Republic of Indonesia Bambang Brodjonegoro.
